title: How to Care for 5 Days Old Chicks #business #chicken #homesteading

subtasks: Place baby chickens in a prepared brooding area
Ensure consistent temperature (90-95°F or 30-32°C) using heat lamps or sunlight
Monitor feeding and adjust crumble or feed as necessary
Clean bedding (using treated paper or sawdust) regularly to prevent ammonia buildup and disease
Check for signs of illness such as labored breathing or diarrhea
Assess chicken activity and feather growth
Replace damp or soiled treated paper with fresh
Change water frequently to prevent bacterial growth
Monitor airflow to prevent ammonia buildup
Transition chicks to larger quarters as they grow and feather development occurs.
